expected: SELECT TRUE AS "true"
SELECT FALSE AS "false"
SELECT CAST('t' AS BOOLEAN) AS "true"
SELECT CAST('   f           ' AS BOOLEAN) AS "false"
SELECT CAST('true' AS BOOLEAN) AS "true"
SELECT CAST('test' AS BOOLEAN) AS error
SELECT CAST('false' AS BOOLEAN) AS "false"
SELECT CAST('foo' AS BOOLEAN) AS error
SELECT CAST('y' AS BOOLEAN) AS "true"
SELECT CAST('yes' AS BOOLEAN) AS "true"
SELECT CAST('yeah' AS BOOLEAN) AS error
SELECT CAST('n' AS BOOLEAN) AS "false"
SELECT CAST('no' AS BOOLEAN) AS "false"
SELECT CAST('nay' AS BOOLEAN) AS error
SELECT CAST('on' AS BOOLEAN) AS "true"
SELECT CAST('off' AS BOOLEAN) AS "false"
SELECT CAST('of' AS BOOLEAN) AS "false"
SELECT CAST('o' AS BOOLEAN) AS error
SELECT CAST('on_' AS BOOLEAN) AS error
SELECT CAST('off_' AS BOOLEAN) AS error
SELECT CAST('1' AS BOOLEAN) AS "true"
SELECT CAST('11' AS BOOLEAN) AS error
SELECT CAST('0' AS BOOLEAN) AS "false"
SELECT CAST('000' AS BOOLEAN) AS error
SELECT CAST('' AS BOOLEAN) AS error

query: SELECT bool 't' or bool 'f' AS true
expected: SELECT CAST('t' AS BOOLEAN) OR CAST('f' AS BOOLEAN) AS "true"

query: SELECT bool 't' and bool 'f' AS false
expected: SELECT CAST('t' AS BOOLEAN) AND CAST('f' AS BOOLEAN) AS "false"
SELECT NOT CAST('f' AS BOOLEAN) AS "true"
SELECT CAST('t' AS BOOLEAN) = CAST('f' AS BOOLEAN) AS "false"
SELECT CAST('t' AS BOOLEAN) <> CAST('f' AS BOOLEAN) AS "true"
SELECT CAST('t' AS BOOLEAN) > CAST('f' AS BOOLEAN) AS "true"
SELECT CAST('t' AS BOOLEAN) >= CAST('f' AS BOOLEAN) AS "true"
SELECT CAST('f' AS BOOLEAN) < CAST('t' AS BOOLEAN) AS "true"
SELECT CAST('f' AS BOOLEAN) <= CAST('t' AS BOOLEAN) AS "true"
SELECT CAST(CAST('TrUe' AS TEXT) AS BOOLEAN) AS "true", CAST(CAST('fAlse' AS TEXT) AS BOOLEAN) AS "false"

query: SELECT '    true   '::text::boolean AS true, '     FALSE'::text::boolean AS false
expected: SELECT CAST(CAST('    true   ' AS TEXT) AS BOOLEAN) AS "true", CAST(CAST('     FALSE' AS TEXT) AS BOOLEAN) AS "false"

query: SELECT true::boolean::text AS true, false::boolean::text AS false
expected: SELECT CAST(CAST(TRUE AS BOOLEAN) AS TEXT) AS "true", CAST(CAST(FALSE AS BOOLEAN) AS TEXT) AS "false"
SELECT CAST(CAST('  tru e ' AS TEXT) AS BOOLEAN) AS invalid
SELECT CAST(CAST('' AS TEXT) AS BOOLEAN) AS invalid
CREATE TABLE booltbl1 (f1 BOOLEAN)
INSERT INTO booltbl1 (f1) VALUES (CAST('t' AS BOOLEAN))
INSERT INTO booltbl1 (f1) VALUES (CAST('True' AS BOOLEAN))
SELECT booltbl1.* FROM booltbl1

query: SELECT BOOLTBL1.* FROM BOOLTBL1 WHERE f1 = bool 'true'
expected: SELECT booltbl1.* FROM booltbl1 WHERE f1 = CAST('true' AS BOOLEAN)

query: SELECT BOOLTBL1.* FROM BOOLTBL1 WHERE f1 <> bool 'false'
expected: SELECT booltbl1.* FROM booltbl1 WHERE f1 <> CAST('false' AS BOOLEAN)

query: SELECT BOOLTBL1.* FROM BOOLTBL1 WHERE booleq(bool 'false', f1)
expected: SELECT booltbl1.* FROM booltbl1 WHERE booleq(CAST('false' AS BOOLEAN), f1)
INSERT INTO booltbl1 (f1) VALUES (CAST('f' AS BOOLEAN))

query: SELECT BOOLTBL1.* FROM BOOLTBL1 WHERE f1 = bool 'false'
expected: SELECT booltbl1.* FROM booltbl1 WHERE f1 = CAST('false' AS BOOLEAN)
CREATE TABLE booltbl2 (f1 BOOLEAN)
INSERT INTO booltbl2 (f1) VALUES (CAST('f' AS BOOLEAN))
INSERT INTO booltbl2 (f1) VALUES (CAST('false' AS BOOLEAN))
INSERT INTO booltbl2 (f1) VALUES (CAST('XXX' AS BOOLEAN))
SELECT booltbl2.* FROM booltbl2

query: SELECT BOOLTBL1.*, BOOLTBL2.* FROM BOOLTBL1, BOOLTBL2 WHERE BOOLTBL2.f1 <> BOOLTBL1.f1
expected: SELECT booltbl1.*, booltbl2.* FROM booltbl1, booltbl2 WHERE booltbl2.f1 <> booltbl1.f1

query: SELECT BOOLTBL1.*, BOOLTBL2.* FROM BOOLTBL1, BOOLTBL2 WHERE boolne(BOOLTBL2.f1,BOOLTBL1.f1)
expected: SELECT booltbl1.*, booltbl2.* FROM booltbl1, booltbl2 WHERE boolne(booltbl2.f1, booltbl1.f1)

query: SELECT BOOLTBL1.*, BOOLTBL2.* FROM BOOLTBL1, BOOLTBL2 WHERE BOOLTBL2.f1 = BOOLTBL1.f1 and BOOLTBL1.f1 = bool 'false'
expected: SELECT booltbl1.*, booltbl2.* FROM booltbl1, booltbl2 WHERE booltbl2.f1 = booltbl1.f1 AND booltbl1.f1 = CAST('false' AS BOOLEAN)

query: SELECT BOOLTBL1.*, BOOLTBL2.* FROM BOOLTBL1, BOOLTBL2 WHERE BOOLTBL2.f1 = BOOLTBL1.f1 or BOOLTBL1.f1 = bool 'true' ORDER BY BOOLTBL1.f1, BOOLTBL2.f1
expected: SELECT booltbl1.*, booltbl2.* FROM booltbl1, booltbl2 WHERE booltbl2.f1 = booltbl1.f1 OR booltbl1.f1 = CAST('true' AS BOOLEAN) ORDER BY booltbl1.f1, booltbl2.f1

query: SELECT f1 FROM BOOLTBL1 WHERE f1 IS TRUE
expected: SELECT f1 FROM booltbl1 WHERE f1 IS TRUE

query: SELECT f1 FROM BOOLTBL1 WHERE f1 IS NOT FALSE
expected: SELECT f1 FROM booltbl1 WHERE f1 IS NOT FALSE

query: SELECT f1 FROM BOOLTBL1 WHERE f1 IS FALSE
expected: SELECT f1 FROM booltbl1 WHERE f1 IS FALSE

query: SELECT f1 FROM BOOLTBL1 WHERE f1 IS NOT TRUE
expected: SELECT f1 FROM booltbl1 WHERE f1 IS NOT TRUE

query: SELECT f1 FROM BOOLTBL2 WHERE f1 IS TRUE
expected: SELECT f1 FROM booltbl2 WHERE f1 IS TRUE

query: SELECT f1 FROM BOOLTBL2 WHERE f1 IS NOT FALSE
expected: SELECT f1 FROM booltbl2 WHERE f1 IS NOT FALSE

query: SELECT f1 FROM BOOLTBL2 WHERE f1 IS FALSE
expected: SELECT f1 FROM booltbl2 WHERE f1 IS FALSE

query: SELECT f1 FROM BOOLTBL2 WHERE f1 IS NOT TRUE
expected: SELECT f1 FROM booltbl2 WHERE f1 IS NOT TRUE

query: CREATE TABLE BOOLTBL3 (d text, b bool, o int)
expected: CREATE TABLE booltbl3 (d TEXT, b BOOLEAN, o INT)

query: INSERT INTO BOOLTBL3 (d, b, o) VALUES ('true', true, 1)
expected: INSERT INTO booltbl3 (d, b, o) VALUES ('true', TRUE, 1)

query: INSERT INTO BOOLTBL3 (d, b, o) VALUES ('false', false, 2)
expected: INSERT INTO booltbl3 (d, b, o) VALUES ('false', FALSE, 2)

query: INSERT INTO BOOLTBL3 (d, b, o) VALUES ('null', null, 3)
expected: INSERT INTO booltbl3 (d, b, o) VALUES ('null', NULL, 3)

query: SELECT d, b IS TRUE AS istrue, b IS NOT TRUE AS isnottrue, b IS FALSE AS isfalse, b IS NOT FALSE AS isnotfalse, b IS UNKNOWN AS isunknown, b IS NOT UNKNOWN AS isnotunknown FROM booltbl3 ORDER BY o
CREATE TABLE booltbl4(isfalse bool, istrue bool, isnul bool)
expected: CREATE TABLE booltbl4 (isfalse BOOLEAN, istrue BOOLEAN, isnul BOOLEAN)

query: INSERT INTO booltbl4 VALUES (false, true, null)
expected: INSERT INTO booltbl4 VALUES (FALSE, TRUE, NULL)

query: SELECT istrue AND istrue AND isnul FROM booltbl4
SELECT isnul AND istrue AND istrue FROM booltbl4
SELECT isfalse AND isnul AND istrue FROM booltbl4
SELECT istrue AND isfalse AND isnul FROM booltbl4
SELECT isnul AND istrue AND isfalse FROM booltbl4

SELECT isnul OR isfalse OR isfalse FROM booltbl4
SELECT isfalse OR isnul OR istrue FROM booltbl4
SELECT istrue OR isfalse OR isnul FROM booltbl4
SELECT isnul OR istrue OR isfalse FROM booltbl4
